io.puremetrics.sdk

Class PureMetrics.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.puremetrics.sdk.PureMetrics.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    PureMetrics

    public static class PureMetrics.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A Builder class for PureMetrics. It provides a convinient way for setting the various properties of PureMetrics.

    Usage: 

     
     PureMetrics.withBuilder()
      .setAppConfiguration("abcdef", "123456")
      .init(getApplicationContext());

      • setAppConfiguration

        public PureMetrics.Builder setAppConfiguration(java.lang.String appId,
                                               java.lang.String appSecret)
        Set the Application Id & Application secret associated with the app. As seen on the PureMetrics dashboard
        Parameters:
        appId - a string representing the app id
        appSecret - a string representation of the secret associated with the app id
        Returns:
        the current instance of PureMetrics.Builder

      • setSessionDuration

        public PureMetrics.Builder setSessionDuration(long timeInMillis)
        Set a custom Session durartion. The default duration is . The value specified cannot be less than or equal to 0
        Parameters:
        timeInMillis - The session duration to be set. Unit is milliseconds
        Returns:
        the current instance of PureMetrics.Builder

      • disableAutoTracking

        public PureMetrics.Builder disableAutoTracking(boolean disable)
        Disable auto session tracking
        Parameters:
        disable - set true if you want to disable auto session tracking
        Returns:
        the current instance of PureMetrics.Builder

        Parameters:

        Returns:
